name: Rep. Josh Harder
tweet_text: Making healthcare affordable isn’t just a talking point. This is real life for me and so many families like mine.

name: Rep. Josh Harder
tweet_text: This is going to save thousands of lives. And save even more people from prescription rationing or bankruptcy. It’s a huge deal.

name: Rep. Josh Harder

tweet_text: When I talk about wildfires, it's not just the risk to our homes and businesses I'm worried about — it's the health of our families, especially our kids. Over 90% of Californians breathe unhealthy levels of pollutants during some part of the year.

name: Rep. Josh Harder
tweet_text: They may be 50 years past due, but these benefits will make an impact on the lives of so many veterans in the Valley and across the nation.

name: Rep. Josh Harder
tweet_text: Here’s the news: Starting this year, more than 30,000 veterans who developed Parkinsonism, Bladder Cancer, and Hypothyroidism due to Agent Orange exposure are now eligible for additional VA benefits for themselves and their families.

name: Rep. Josh Harder
tweet_text: So I buckled down and I got to work to fix that. Eventually, our team brought together Democrats and Republicans, wrote a bill, built a coalition, and eventually got our policy signed into law.

name: Rep. Josh Harder
tweet_text: When I got to Congress, I learned that so many Vietnam veterans like my grandpa were being denied their benefits because the VA hadn’t kept up with the science on what conditions were ultimately caused by Agent Orange.

name: Rep. Josh Harder
tweet_text: Growing up, I heard stories of my grandpa’s service in Vietnam. Unfortunately, like so many soldiers who served abroad during the war, he got sick because of service time exposure to the toxic chemical Agent Orange.

name: Rep. Josh Harder
tweet_text: Yesterday was National Vietnam War Veterans Day, a day to honor the 3 million men and women who served our nation almost 50 years ago. To commemorate the day, I had the honor of joining veteran leaders in Modesto to announce new benefits for our veterans. https://t.co/dqhp9iuBCy

name: Rep. Josh Harder
tweet_text: Do I need to sign up? No, the IRS will use your most recent tax return to see if you qualify.

name: Rep. Josh Harder
tweet_text: When will I get it? Eligible families will start getting payments as early as July.

name: Rep. Josh Harder
tweet_text: Do I qualify? Most families in the Valley will qualify. You get the full child tax credit if you earn $75,000 or less or if as a couple you earn $150,000 or less. From there, the credit decreases as your income increases.

name: Rep. Josh Harder
tweet_text: How much will I receive? Most parents in the Valley will get $3,600 for each child under six, and $3,000 for each child aged 6 - 17. You can calculate what you’ll get here: https://t.co/Gmz07rVzDq

name: Rep. Josh Harder
tweet_text: What is a child tax credit? It gives direct payments and/or lowers taxes for eligible parents and caretakers.

name: Rep. Josh Harder
tweet_text: First off, what has changed? We made the child tax credit fully refundable, meaning you’ll get the credit no matter how much you owe in taxes. We also increased it by thousands of dollars.
